coreAttributes.name: velvet choker
coreAttributes.description: A plain velvet choker, which tightly hugs the wearer's neck. It is securely fastened in place by means of a delicate metal chain, which is liable to break if the wearer's throat bulges too much...

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the velvet choker around [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] securely [npc.verb(fasten)] the velvet choker around [npc2.namePos] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before securely fastening the velvet choker around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] velvet choker, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] velvet choker, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] velvet choker, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
